title: My ranked is glitching out
body:
I was in ranked i accepted queue pop i then get kicked for missing it and then i wait the 5 minute get into a game then every champion was 
unbanable and it then kicked me for that so now i cant play ranked and i just get a black screen whenever i try queue up. and after a minute-ish it sends me back to home screen.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following for me;

* [Repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)
* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)

Let me know if this helps.
